entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
